meta.title: Badges
meta.description: Badges are really easy to use. You just wrap the text in span.badge and you're done! This works inside all elements (p, h1,h2, ...) and can be used as notification.
meta.author: NoTime

page.innerHtml: Badges are really easy to use. You just wrap the text in span.badge and you're done! This works inside all elements (p, h1,h2, ...) and can be used as notification.
